stepService.header: Which service is right for you?

collectionCard.title: Collection Services
collectionCard.subtitle: Hassle free!
collectionCard.text: We offer an unmatched collection service, whether it is for residential, commercial or industrial. We'll collect your junk quickly and hassle-free.

containerCard.title: Container Rental Services
containerCard.subtitle: Perfect for contractors
containerCard.text: We offer rental containers of different dimensions for all your residential, commercial and industrial needs. 10, 14, 20, and 40 yard containers available.

thanks.title: Thank you!
thanks.subtext: We'll be in touch soon to finalize your order.

collection.subject: Collection
collection.body: Leave us your e-mail address and (or) phone number, and we'll get back to you as soon as possible. Thank you.

rental.subject: Container rental
rental.body: Leave us your e-mail address and (or) phone number, and we'll get back to you as soon as possible. Thank you.

homepage.subtext: We collect furniture, appliances, bulky items, construction debris, junk and much more.

collection.body: We offer an unmatched collection service, whether it is for residential, commercial or industrial. We'll collect your junk quickly and hassle-free.

rental.body: We offer rental containers of different dimensions for all your residential, commercial and industrial needs. 10, 14, 20, and 40 yard containers available.

residential.title: Residential
residential.description: We collect your undesirable furniture and bulky objects.

appliances.title: Appliances
appliances.description: We collect appliances. Regardless of the floor, no worries! Our team will collect them easily.

commercial.title: Commercial
commercial.description: We collect office furniture and equipment, hassle-free.

construction.title: Construction
construction.description: We also collect all your construction debris.

about.p1B: is a young Quebec-based enterprise, a dynamic team who works hard in order to embellish the environment.
about.p2: Concerned and protective of the environment, and thanks to our very own sorting center, our goal is to become the leaders in collection and recycling in the province.
about.p3: We donate to charity reusable articles in order to give a second life to your furniture. We believe it is time to act, to make the planet a better place to live.
